Leon's Blog(n) v.1.9.8.4

End of Second week of classes

17 Sep 2021

This week is coming to a close. Worked on my Numerical algs assignment and made a little animation for the first question and the 2D version for the next question.

The former is the Finite Difference solution to on the domain with boundary conditions.

The latter is the Finite Difference solution to on the domain with boundary conditions.

Second week of classes

14 Sep 2021

It’s the second week of classes! Still mainly syllabus stuff. Messed around with the starter code of the Computational PDEs course to make this.

School starts in 2 Weeks!

23 Aug 2021

Read the Leviathan series! Excited for Leviathan falls this fall.

I also read Ao Ashi, cool soccer manga like Blue Lock.

Been learning “Autumn Leaves in 10 styles” on the piano. Learned the first 3 styles so far, 7 left. The funky latin looks fun.

School starts in 3 weeks!

08 Aug 2021

I’ve learned a new song called Tea for Two which was arranged by Pierre-Yves Plat and composed by Vincent Youmans.

Also been trying to get my old physics assignment up on the blog. It’s written in C++, so I’m trying to get Google NACL to work but its making be me pretty salty so far …

John 3-7. You should not be surprised at my saying, You must be born again.

28 Jul 2021

Restarting blog. Let’s see how long I can keep this updated for. This summer I didn’t do that much, but there’s some animations I will show off! I also played a lot of piano as well!
